homeHero: We are a Digital Products Platform and a Development Lab focused on Innovation in the areas of E-Commerce, X-Border Payments, AI, and Machines (IoT) for LATAM.
devText:
In addition to our dashboards, Futurewise provides a single, elegant interface that abstracts away all the complexity of enterprise integrations.

With ready-made APIs to integrate each of our products into your own system.
devConfira: Also check out our editor themes for
quote: Futurewise is not a standard dictionary word, but it is generally used as an adjective or adverb meaning "with regard to the future" or "in terms of the future"
aboutText:
We are an innovation & development lab experimenting in the intersection of e-Commerce, Payments, AI and Machines, with a focus in LATAM.

We have fun experimenting with technology... We build real-world applications & machines.

We are minimalists & efficient. We aim at building performant systems with little. We use what it's best, we do not reinvent wheels. No charge for it. We are techno-optimists.

// We design, we experiment, we ship!

We are also a platform for developing Digital Products. We offer our infrastructure, APIs and libraries to experimental projects.

Some experiments fail, do not reach the level of products, so they remain as acquired knowledge in the form of libraries, designs, and articles.

Sometimes ideas do not leave their form, so we let them mature in the Idea Lab.

// The stack.

Futurewise's stack is simple yet powerful: Svelte & Figma for the front-end, NestJS for our APIs, Python for AI & MicroPython for embedded systems, and Docker for containerization, Bitcoin & USDT via a Lightning for value preservation & money transmission, Vercel, Render & AWS for cloud infrastructure.

We believe in permission-less, global, open protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP, Bitcoin, Nostr, WebRTC, etc) and technologies.

Sometimes we use our expertise to contribute to other projects. In these Joint Ventures we participate as technological partners, providing our infrastructure, APIs & our team.

We first solve our own problems through technology, and then make valuable products out of it.

We also curate a list of third party Tools that we ourselves use on a daily basis, aiming to share with others not only our own stuff, but what it's best out there.

// OS.

We nurse from open-source, so we contribute to open-source. Many of the libraries we create for our products can be found in our GitHub or NPM profiles. Sometimes even complete projects!

Have a crazy idea? Let's chat about it, we will love it, get in touch.

    ';'>
  • Check our products and our simple pricing.
  • Check out all of our archived experiments here.
  • Check out our open-source libraries & projects.

Let's build stuff,
~The Futurewise Team
metaHomeDescription: We are a Digital Products Platform and a Development Lab focused on Innovation in e-Commerce, Payments, AI, and Machines, for LATAM.
